about_the_game:
Set a stone's throw into the future, Maid For My Master is a cute romance story between an unlikely pair.

Asahi is a young man who was born and raised in the countryside. He moves to Tokyo, hoping to make a new life for himself, but he soon discovers that the big city isn't all it's cracked up to be. Asahi doesn't have much in the way of money, and he has to scrimp and save while working a low-paying job at a convenience store.

Asahi's co-worker, Nazuna, is unfailingly cold and rude, and as chilly winter sets in, Asahi begins to wonder whether he made a mistake in leaving home...

At least, until he meets the mysterious maid, Holly, and feelings between them begin to blossom.

Holly is Asahi's dream girl. She's kind, gentle, and affectionate (even if she is slightly taller than he is), but there's a catch. Holly isn't a human at all: she's a robot! Can Asahi's relationship with Holly flourish, or is it doomed to a critical failure?

- 90k of text (approx 3-5 hours of reading)

- a linear narrative with no choices or branches

- original character and background artwork in a cute anime style

- an original soundtrack

- one robot maid

- a cute romance story!!!

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains some suggestive content, such as scenes depicting an adult female character in the bath, wearing lingerie, or wearing nothing but a towel. There is also some explicit language. There are no explicit sexual scenes, however.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

name: Maid For My Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any audio output

short_description: A cute romance story between a young man and a maid who just so happens to be a robot. Is love enough to overcome the differences between man and machine?
